attributes.action: Scrap any plans for 'external assessments' for GCSE and A level students in 2021
attributes.background: The plans to replace exams this year with 'external assessments' should be scrapped as it would put more pressure on teachers marking. As well as this, Wales have also scrapped their 'external assessments' and the DFE and Ofqual should follow suit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569280
